description:
In the depths of the Humaritt laboratory, Najica has finally found Dr. Ren, only to discover that the person calling herself "Dr. Ren" is actually none other than the deadly, deranged, demoniacal Humaritt Triple X! 
As Najica faces off against this new opponent, Lila finds herself growing closer to Alpha, the Humaritt boy who is Ren`s latest creation. How will Triple X react to the bond between Lila and her beloved Alpha? And how will this new bond affect  Lila`s relationship with Najica?

titles.title: A Splendid Agent has the Rose of the Encounter in the Mind
Die Rose im Herzen der Agentin verheißt eine Begegnung
Karei Naru Agent wa Kaikou no Bara o Kokoro ni
Le superbe agent au cœur paré de la rose du destin
華麗なるエージェントは邂逅の薔薇を心に
